thread.title: Back to Future fan Jeremy Guthrie rocks special Nike shoes
thread.title_full: Back to Future fan Jeremy Guthrie rocks special Nike shoes - KCTV5

author: DeAnn Smith, Digital Content Manager
title: Back to Future fan Jeremy Guthrie rocks special Nike shoes
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - During the ALCS, Jeremy Guthrie is sitting on the bench as head cheerleader, music maker and prankster (well perhaps second to Salvy Perez in the prankster category).
When he bounded up the stairs at Rogers Centre and stood for the national anthem Wednesday, you couldn't help but notice.... THOSE SHOES! 

Roads? Where we're going, we don't need roads. #BackToTheFuture #TakeTheCrown pic.twitter.com/QjrNPwPvFD 
— Jeremy Guthrie (@TheRealJGuts) October 21, 2015 The sneakers addict, er, collector has many pairs. But the Nike Air Mag that were released in 2011 have a special point of pride to him.
That's because he is a big Back to the Future f an and, of course, Oct. 21, 2015, had special significance in the movie.
Back To the Future I & II were/are my fav movies ever...I have looked forward to this day for years! We finally made it! Oct 21, 2015 #MJFox 
— Jeremy Guthrie (@TheRealJGuts) October 21, 2015 So there he was wearing the shoes during Game 5 of the ALCS. Only 1,500 were made.
The shoes even caught the eye of MLB who tweeted about them.
What are those?! #BackToTheFuture pic.twitter.com/uxUx5OgvPT 
— MLB (@MLB) October 21, 2015 On Wednesday, Nike announced a new Mag with self-tying laces would be released in the coming months. It will be a limited edition, and you can only imagine that Guthrie will get a pair of those faster than one of his fast balls. Click here to read more about the shoes.
